name: MTLPurgeableState
desc: The purgeable state of the resource.

items.name: case keepCurrent
items.desc: The current state is queried but doesn't change.

items.name: case nonVolatile
items.desc: The contents of the resource aren't allowed to be discarded.

items.name: case volatile
items.desc: The system is allowed to discard the resource to free up memory.

items.name: case empty
items.desc: The contents of the resource are or will be discarded.
